body.name: Rechargeable Wall Mounted Lighted Makeup Vanity Mirror 8 Inch Double Sided 1X 10X Magnifying Bathroom Mirror, 3 Color Lighting, Touch Screen Dimming, Extended Arm 360 Rotation Shaving Light up Mirror
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 36 mins
features: 🔌𝐑𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐦 𝐌𝐢𝐫𝐫𝐨𝐫:This upgraded wall mounted makeup mirror built-in 1800 mAh rechargeable Lithium battery. You don’t have to replace batteries frequently any more, and no worry about breaking while replacing batteries. The vanity mirror can be used wireless after charged through USB ( A chrging cable is included, charger not included )

💪𝟏𝐗/𝟏𝟎𝐗 𝐃𝐨𝐮𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐒𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐝 𝐌𝐚𝐠𝐧𝐢𝐟𝐲𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐌𝐢𝐫𝐫𝐨𝐫:This lighted vanity mirror is double sided with 1X and 10X magnification. The high definition 1X lighted mirror for your overall makeup, and 10X maganifying beauty mirror shows details of your face when putting eyeliner, mascare, perfect for delicate makeup.Please keep 4 inch distance when use the lighted 10x magnifying mirror to avoid dizzy.

💡𝟑 𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐫 𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬&𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐀𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞:This vanity wall mounted mirror offers white lights, warm lights and cool lights. Easily switch the color temp between warm glow to white glow to see how exactly your makeup will look in various lightning situations like daytime, evening and working environment. Touch the sensor switch to change color light, long press to adjust brightness

🎡𝟑𝟔𝟎° 𝐑𝐨𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 & 𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐀𝐫𝐦:The lighted makeup mirror with magnification is mounted on the wall, designed with a extendable arm. 360 degree free rotation provides you with a comfortable viewing angle when putting on makeup, shaving or wearing contact lenses. It can be folded against the wall to save space when not in use

🛩️𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐮𝐦 𝐌𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥&𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧:This wall mounted lighted makeup mirror made in anti-rust and moisture stainless steeland HD mirror surface which is durable.This bathroom vanity mirror with lights is very simple to install, no need to be professional. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dual Sided Vanity Mirror with 1X 10X Magnification Warm Tips: Please put your face within 4 inches when using 10X magnifying mirror side
3 Color Lighting Modes Simple touch the sensor switch to turn on / off the light. Short press for changing 3 lights modes. Hold the button for seconds can adjust brightness

Other Features of this Lighted Bathroom Makeup Mirror Extending Wall Mounted Mirror With a 360° swivel extending arm, it is easy to fix this make up mirror at any angle. What's more, it can be folded back when not in use, saving space 360 Degree Swivel Design This lighted makeup mirror with extendable arm joint allow 360°rotation. It provides you with a comfortable viewing angle in makeup application Smart Touch Screen This Bathroom vanity mirror features a high-sensitivity touch screen sensor design that has a longer life than traditional mechanical buttons Ideal Gift for Lover It's the best gift for lover in Halloween, Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Birthday, Party, Performance, Special occasions, etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly Recommended - A Marvelous Addition to My Vanity Space
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 8-inch rechargeable, wall-mounted, double-sided makeup vanity mirror, and I am absolutely delighted with it. This product has exceeded my expectations in every way, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their makeup routine.Firstly, the installation process was a breeze. I was initially concerned about mounting it on the wall, but the instructions were clear and straightforward. It took minimal effort to set it up, and it was securely attached to the wall in no time. This hassle-free installation is a big plus, especially for someone who isn't very handy with tools.The functionality of this mirror is nothing short of wonderful. The double-sided feature is extremely useful, offering both a standard and magnified view. This makes it perfect for detailed makeup application, ensuring that every eyeliner wing and eyebrow stroke is precise. The clarity of the mirror is impeccable, providing a true-to-life reflection that is essential for accurate makeup application.Moreover, the rechargeable aspect of this mirror adds a level of convenience that I greatly appreciate. It's easy to charge, and the battery life is impressive. I don't have to worry about dealing with cords or constantly replacing batteries, which is a significant advantage.In conclusion, this makeup vanity mirror is a fantastic product. Its ease of installation, superb functionality, and the convenience of being rechargeable make it a standout choice. It has become an indispensable part of my daily makeup routine, and I am sure it will be the same for anyone who decides to purchase it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great extendable mirror!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice mirror, liked that the screws are hidden from view by a cover plate, finish is nice.Addition of the light ring around the mirrors is Great - and Dimmable! And three different light strengths.Easy to install, the USB recharge cable plugs right in to the wall receptacle with USB sockets.Will see if these nice features hold up over time, but so far a very nice mirror upgrade!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and functional
reviews.reviewText: Why didn’t I buy this sooner? Doesn’t everyone need this? I love that this is 2-sided with magnification, on an extendable arm, lighted AND CORDLESS!! Come on people! ADD TO CART!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The installation process was quick and easy. I am impressed with the brightness it provides. However, I did notice that the rotation is not as smooth. It could be because the product is new and needs some time to ease in. Overall, I am satisfied with my purchase so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got one after hotel stay
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is double-sided, with one side offering 1X magnification and the other side giving you a super close-up 10X magnification. It's perfect for getting those tiny details just right!But that's not all - this mirror also features three color lighting options, so you can choose between warm, natural, or cool lighting depending on your preference and the lighting in your room. It's like having your very own professional makeup studio at home!The touch screen dimming function is a total game-changer. You can easily adjust the brightness of the mirror with just a tap of your finger. No more squinting or struggling to see yourself clearly!The mirror has an extended arm that can rotate a full 360 degrees. This means you can position it at the perfect angle for your needs, whether you're doing your makeup, shaving, or anything else that requires a clear view. It's so convenient!One of the best features of this mirror is that it's rechargeable. No need to worry about constantly replacing batteries - just charge it up and you're good to go! It's eco-friendly and cost-effective. 🌿🔋If you're someone who loves makeup, grooming, or just wants to have a high-quality mirror in your bathroom, the Rechargeable Wall Mounted Lighted Makeup Vanity Mirror is an absolute must-have. It's versatile, convenient, and helps you look your best every day. 💁💖💄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the fancy hotels
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice size 2 sided mirror. Regular & 10 times magnifier. You have the option of no light or 3 different settings. Easy to install. Inexpensive but does not look cheap. We purchased brushed nickel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice mirror and amazing lighting
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is very nice looking. Took it out of the box and turned it on, light was bright and looked very elegant.Liked the different light tones from bright to dim on both sides.The USB charging is simple.Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Crooked construction detracts from an otherwise good mirror
reviews.reviewText: There are many things I like about this light. The light is good and strong and there's both a natural light and an indoor light. It charges easily overnight and a charge last several days with frequent use.One thing I don't like is I noticed after my handyman installed it that where the mirror arm meets the mounting plate, is crooked. It causes the mirror to tip slightly to the right. This is a manufacturing flaw, it came with the mirror arm already attached to the mounting plate. It is just slightly off but it is extremely annoying!
Muy bueno y facil de cargar la luz
Choosing a model that can be installed on the wall helps those with limited bathroom counter space. This rechargeable mirror is a hit with my wife.

Fue un regalo para mí pareja y le encanta. Queda bien en la pared y con el espejo normal y el aumento 10x le permite maquillarse muy bien. Los tres tipos de luces q las puedes poner más o menos fuerte tb van bien. El único pero es q se cargan con un cable q tiene q ir a un USB y si no tienes un enchufe con USB cerca tienes q usar un cargador, aunque la carga parece q dura bastante

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used in a Bathroom. This is a really great product. It looks and feels top quality and the LED light is really good.I didn't think we'd need the dimming facility and also the different settings like white light or skin tones, but in fact as opposed to being gimmicky those features are really useful and shows that this product is a well thought out and well designed product.Credit goes to the design team!!I have now ordered a second one as we have his and hers sinks and the second one will be for shaving use.!I'll post a picture once I have received and mounted the second one.
